info.what: There are 4 anonymous members way back in senior high school who's aspiring to be a professional developers, they started become a team then and develop an application and website together. After Senior High School the anonymous team went to college together and they started to develop website, desktop application, and mobile application for project and case studies upon being together they started to plan about building a company that they can expand in the future. After graduating college the anonymous team finally established the company and that time the 4 anonymous college students become professionals and build the Code Red Development Company.
